search.query: | tstats sum(num_trips) as count where index=route_stats by agency_name agency_id | eval desc = agency_name." (".agency_id.")" | sort -count

| tstats count where index="route_stats" agency_id=$agency_id$ by start_stop_city | rename start_stop_city as stop_city | append [| tstats count where index="route_stats" agency_id=$agency_id$ by end_stop_city | rename end_stop_city as stop_city] | stats count by stop_city
| tstats count where index="route_stats" AND agency_id=$agency_id$ AND (start_stop_city=$stop_city$ OR end_stop_city=$stop_city$) by route_short_name

| tstats count max(num_trips) as num_trips where index="route_stats" AND route_short_name=$route_short_name$ AND agency_id=$agency_id$ AND (start_stop_city=$stop_city$ OR end_stop_city=$stop_city$) by agency_name start_stop_city route_short_name route_long_name route_id | eval description = "קו ".route_short_name." (".route_id.") - ".route_long_name." - ".num_trips." נסיעות" | sort -num_trips
fields date route_id bad_trips_ratio | xyseries date route_id bad_trips_ratio

((index=siri lat!=0 [search index=route_stats agency_id=$agency_id$ $route_id$ | makemv delim=";" all_start_time | stats count by route_id all_start_time | rename all_start_time AS planned_start_time | fields - count]) OR index=route_stats) $route_id$ agency_id=$agency_id$ | makemv delim=";" all_start_time | eval start_time = coalesce(planned_start_time, all_start_time) | stats dc(time_recorded) as siri_points by route_id date start_time | eval missing_trips = if(siri_points==0, start_time, NULL) | eval less_than_ten_trips = if(siri_points<10 AND siri_points>0, start_time, NULL) | stats avg(siri_points) as avg_points count(eval(siri_points==0)) as no_siri count(eval(siri_points<10 AND siri_points>0)) as less_than_ten_siri count as total values(missing_trips) values(less_than_ten_trips) by route_id date | eval avg_points = round(avg_points,1) | eval bad_trips_ratio = round((no_siri+less_than_ten_siri)/total,2)
